item.title: Cats Effect Part One: Effects
item.description: Cats Effect Series For some time now, I’ve been meaning to learn about cats effect. My plan is to follow the Essential Effects by Adam Rosien You can find a copy of the book here: https://essentialeffects.dev/ Though at the time of writing, the book is still in draft version. I will be summarizing my understanding of each chapter in blog posts (chapter by chapter). I will also be solving and posting some of their exercises.
